title: Samsung reveals details for its new Exynos 1280 chipset
content:
Samsung has already started shipping phones with its Exynos 1280 chipset, including the Galaxy A53, A33, and M33, but the company hasn’t actually said a lot about the new chip. Now the company has (belatedly) revealed details about the new design, which will likely appear in more mid-range Samsung phones over the coming months. The

The post Samsung reveals details for its new Exynos 1280 chipset appeared first on xda-developers.
